teamTranslate.vovaAbout: Aspiring React developer with foundational knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Gained experience through personal projects and online courses. Eager to develop skills in web application development and learn new technologies. Confident in my ability to work in a team and quickly adapt to new tools.
teamTranslate.ludaAbout: I have successfully completed IT-Academy courses on website and web application development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. My experience includes front-end development and maintaining existing applications with the Angular framework. I am organized, goal-oriented, tactful, and reliable. A strong team player, I am ready to take on responsibility, work diligently, and continue learning and improving my professional skills in web development. Currently, I am actively studying React to expand my expertise.
teamTranslate.margoAbout: I am passionate about combining programming with the design of beautiful frontend applications. Working with React, I discover new and exciting ways to bring my ideas to life. My goal is to create intuitive and appealing user interfaces, which allows me to showcase the beauty of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

Uladzimir Hancharou.0: Developed RESTful client pages and history.
Uladzimir Hancharou.1: Implemented debounce to reduce the amount of rerendering.
Uladzimir Hancharou.2: Implemented auto-generation of code via postman-codegen.
Uladzimir Hancharou.3: Implemented display of the response from the server.
Uladzimir Hancharou.4: Implemented support for variables in queries.
Uladzimir Hancharou.5: Implemented query history using LocalStorage for storage and recovery.

Liudmila Burbouskaya.0: Developed a login and register page.
Liudmila Burbouskaya.1: Added adaptive navigation to the header for mobile or desktop devices.

Marharyta Parkalava.0: Developed the main page, header/footer, page with variables.
Marharyta Parkalava.1: Implemented functions for storing variables in LocalStorage, as well as adding and deleting variables.
Marharyta Parkalava.3: Created a design system of reusable components.
